body: What a happy ending! The MC got nothing to lose to begin with. Tho I'd probably train and pimp her out. Revenge of any form is out of question though since there's nothing to gain from vengeance.

God damn man, the 1st chapter of this series is the sole work that forced me to acknowledge the existence of NTR in my life, not MTSP, not Miyabi Tsuzuru, not Carn, not another artist. God, it's so destructive i can't sleep for about 2 weeks, but now i'm alive and ready to fap...
Lol 3 years break after 2nd chapter. Damn takeda hiromitsu, but waiting for english version cuz this is nice.
